qas.question: What channel did Marvel buy to self-distribute its own comics in the 1990s?

plausible_answers.text: exclusive distribution deals with other companies

When was Marvel's Heroes World declared a financial success?
When was Diamond Comic Distributors Inc. founded?

context: In <b9_0>late <a1_0><b6_0>1994<b9_0/><b6_0/><a1_0/>, Marvel acquired the comic book distributor <a0_0>Heroes World Distribution<a0_0/> to use as its own exclusive distributor. As the industry's other major publishers made <b7_0>exclusive distribution deals with other companies<b7_0/>, the ripple effect resulted in the survival of only one other major distributor in North America, <a2_0><b5_0>Diamond Comic Distributors Inc<b5_0/><a2_0/>.
